description: Entertain in style with this colourful chargrilled veggie platter with bean dip. Serve with dukkah-brushed Lebanese bread for some delicious dipping.
keywords: Roast vegetable,Pescatarian,Low saturated fat,Seafood free,Low salt,Egg free,Low sugar,Sep 2021,Halal,High protein,High fibre,Soy free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Dairy free
name: Chargrilled Vegetable Platter With Bean Dip Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.33 cup Woolworths extra virgin olive oil
1 red capsicum, halved, deseeded, thickly sliced

recipeInstructions.text: Place beans, garlic, zest, lemon juice, tahini and half the oil in a food processor and process until smooth. Season with pepper. Transfer to a small bowl.

Reserve 1 tsp dukkah. Place asparagus, zucchini, capsicum, onion, carrots, and remaining dukkah and oil in a large bowl and toss to coat. Heat a barbecue grill or chargrill pan over high heat. Cook asparagus, zucchini and capsicum for 4 minutes, turning halfway, oruntil golden and tender. Set aside and cover to keep warm. Cook onion and carrots for 5 minutes, turning halfway, or until golden and tender. Set aside and cover to keep warm.
Brush bread with any remaining dukkah mixture in bowl. Cook bread for 2 minutes on each side or until charred and crisp.
Arrange vegetables on a platter around bean dip scattered with reserved dukkah. Serve with bread.
